data.text: @APDillon_ @JohnBellNC Agree. Only reason this is not happening is @NC_Governor Roy Cooper is a tyrant. #NorthCarolina
@APDillon_ @JohnBellNC @NC_Governor  this man would’ve kept you locked down and definitely. Thank God for the Republican caucus.
@APDillon_ @jjdacey1 @JohnBellNC It is EXTREMELY important that @ncgop take a WRECKING ball to these people in November so that they never, ever rise again.
@ArcturusM8 @APDillon_ @JohnBellNC Oh there needs to charges for crimes against humanity, a trial, and hopefully long prison sentences for Generalissimo Cooper and Chief Henchperson Cohen. #ncpol
@APDillon_ @JohnBellNC “Ready to move on”?  Not quite. First, Cooper owes a lot of people an apology and his resignation.
